verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G1230><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> was past <S%G1230><s%> <S%G5637><s%>, Miryam <S%G3137><s%> from Magdala <S%G3094><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> the mother <S%G3588><s%> of Ya`akov <S%G2385><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Shlomit <S%G4539><s%>, had bought <S%G59><s%> <S%G5656><s%> sweet spices <S%G759><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they might come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and anoint <S%G218><s%> <S%G5661><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> very <S%G3029><s%> early in the morning <S%G4404><s%> the first <S%G3391><s%> day of the week <S%G4521><s%>, they came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5736><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the sepulchre <S%G3419><s%> at the rising <S%G393><s%> <S%G5660><s%> of the sun <S%G2246><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> shall roll <S%G617><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> away <S%G617><s%> <S%G5692><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of the sepulchre <S%G3419><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> when they looked <S%G308><s%> <S%G5660><s%>, they saw <S%G2334><s%> <S%G5719><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the stone <S%G3037><s%> was rolled away <S%G617><s%> <S%G5769><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> it was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> very <S%G4970><s%> great <S%G3173><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> entering <S%G1525><s%> <S%G5631><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sepulchre <S%G3419><s%>, they saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a young man <S%G3495><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the right side <S%G1188><s%>, clothed <S%G4016><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in a long white <S%G3022><s%> garment <S%G4749><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they were affrighted <S%G1568><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Be <S%G1568><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> affrighted <S%G1568><s%> <S%G5744><s%>: Ye seek <S%G2212><s%> <S%G5719><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> of Natzeret <S%G3479><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was crucified <S%G4717><s%> <S%G5772><s%>: he is risen <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5681><s%>; he is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> here <S%G5602><s%>: behold <S%G2396><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they laid <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> go your way <S%G5217><s%> <S%G5720><s%>, tell <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5628><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Talmidim <S%G3101><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Kefa <S%G4074><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he goeth before <S%G4254><s%> <S%G5719><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the Galil <S%G1056><s%>: there <S%G1563><s%> shall ye see <S%G3700><s%> <S%G5695><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, as <S%G2531><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they went out <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>, and fled <S%G5343><s%> <S%G5627><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the sepulchre <S%G3419><s%>; for <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G846><s%> trembled <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5707><s%> <S%G5156><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were amazed <S%G1611><s%>: neither <S%G2532><s%> said they <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> any thing <S%G3762><s%> to any <S%G3762><s%> man; for <S%G1063><s%> they were afraid <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5711><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Yeshuw`a was risen <S%G450><s%> <S%G5631><s%> early <S%G4404><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> day of the week <S%G4521><s%>, he appeared <S%G5316><s%> <S%G5648><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to Miryam <S%G3137><s%> from Magdala <S%G3094><s%>, out of <S%G575><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he had cast <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5715><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%>.

And she <S%G1565><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them that had been <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5637><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, as they mourned <S%G3996><s%> <S%G5723><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wept <S%G2799><s%> <S%G5723><s%>.

And they <S%G2548><s%>, when they had heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5660><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was alive <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5719><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had been seen <S%G2300><s%> <S%G5681><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> her <S%G846><s%>, believed not <S%G569><s%> <S%G5656><s%>.

After <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3326><s%> that <S%G5023><s%> he appeared <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> form <S%G3444><s%> unto two <S%G1417><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, as they walked <S%G4043><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and went <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5740><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the country <S%G68><s%>.

And they <S%G2548><s%> went <S%G565><s%> <S%G5631><s%> and told <S%G518><s%> <S%G5656><s%> it unto the residue <S%G3062><s%>: neither <S%G3761><s%> believed they <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them <S%G1565><s%>.

Afterward <S%G5305><s%> he appeared <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5681><s%> unto the eleven <S%G1733><s%> as they <S%G846><s%> sat at meat <S%G345><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> upbraided <S%G3679><s%> <S%G5656><s%> them with their <S%G846><s%> unbelief <S%G570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hardness of heart <S%G4641><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5656><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> them which had seen <S%G2300><s%> <S%G5666><s%> him <S%G846><s%> after he was risen <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go ye <S%G4198><s%> <S%G5679><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and preach <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5657><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2937><s%>.

He that believeth <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5660><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is immersed <S%G907><s%> <S%G5685><s%> shall be saved <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5701><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> he that believeth not <S%G569><s%> <S%G5660><s%> shall be damned <S%G2632><s%> <S%G5701><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> shall follow <S%G3877><s%> <S%G5692><s%> them that believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5660><s%>; In <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> shall they cast out <S%G1544><s%> <S%G5692><s%> devils <S%G1140><s%>; they shall speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5692><s%> with new <S%G2537><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%>;

They shall take up <S%G142><s%> <S%G5692><s%> serpents <S%G3789><s%>; and if <S%G2579><s%> they drink <S%G4095><s%> <S%G5632><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> deadly <S%G2286><s%> thing <S%G5100><s%>, it shall not <S%G3364><s%> hurt <S%G984><s%> <S%G5692><s%> them <S%G846><s%>; they shall lay <S%G2007><s%> <S%G5692><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sick <S%G732><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they shall <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5692><s%> recover <S%G2573><s%>.

So <S%G3303><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> had spoken <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5658><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, he was received up <S%G353><s%> <S%G5681><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> <S%G5656><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> went forth <S%G1831><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, and preached <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5656><s%> every where <S%G3837><s%>, the YY <S%G2962><s%> working with <S%G4903><s%> <S%G5723><s%> them, and <S%G2532><s%> confirming <S%G950><s%> <S%G5723><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> following <S%G1872><s%> <S%G5723><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
